ygData.subject: Re: Smithing
ygData.msgSnippet:
Make skewers to get your skill up, these are good until skill 115, although
around skill 110, I was good enough at making banded that I stopped advancing
my
ygData.messageBody:
Make skewers to get your skill up, these are good until skill 115, although
around skill 110, I was good enough at making banded that I stopped advancing
my skill and just made armor for sale. I believe after skewers you can
make skewing kits up to skill 175.


> From: imaohw@...
>
> Hello all,
>
> I am a level 93 smith at the moment. I am trying
> to level up but it is going really slow. Banded
> bracers and gorgets are not trivial yet so i keep
> making them. The problem is that i spent like
> twenty plat making bracers with no skill advancement.
> Is there other items i should be making instead
> of the bracers and gorgets?? Something cheaper to
> make?? Also..does anybody know if we can make chain
> mail?? and if so..is it a better quality item??
>
> Thanks
> Appylon
> veeshan server
